column3: utACK\nBut please add a comment that this is a workaround that can be removed once `osslsigncode` supports the new API. We've had a case recently where we didn't know why a certain specific version of a lib was enforced anymore.

@MarcoFalke @laanwj just as a heads up for the codesigner, compiling osslsigncode with curl (needed for  detached-sig-create.sh) creates an in compatibility between curl which requires libssl-dev and libssl1.0-dev. Therefore that compilation of osslsigncode needs to be performed on ubuntu 16.04.\nI'm still not sure why the gitianbuild compiles osslsigncode without curl, as this requires two seper
